item.title: The FBI opened a case on Bigfoot and tested unknown hairs — here’s what it found
Boat crew almost ‘laughed in our faces after our luggage was swept out to sea’
item.description: Australian tourist Alice Zamparelli was left fuming

item.title: Creepy man finds ‘amazing’ dead body and calls it in to radio show instead of cops
item.description: The man, who called himself Joseph but refused to give his real name, said he was 'exploring nature and look what I came upon.'

item.title: Someone is trying to profit from Bogeyman of Liverpool’s death
item.description: 'This was not about sex this was about using and abusing the dolls with revenge in mind.'

item.title: Son puts on dead mother’s lipstick and jewellery to collect pension with her body mummified at home
item.description: The son could is now the subject of further investigations and could face charges of concealment of a corpse and fraud.
